title: 10 gemstone reward hextech crafting
body: I was just wondering if riot change the rewards instead of it being just hextech Annie and soul stealer vanne. because i have 9 but I don't really want either of them

replies.body: they will add more eventually. It was originally only Annie then they added Vayne and the Ward so no doubt there will be a few more.
^ exactly. Just be patient, hold onto your gems and wait to see what comes next.
Annie Skins is okay still not worth what i spent for it :P Vayne one looks alot better they should make alot more that have better effects and stuff

The annie one is shit.

Especially since she has so many skins that just look better.
